question:
Consider the following:
  1. Loggerhead
  2. Hawksbill
  3. Leatherback
Which of the above is / are common names of the turtles found in India?
explanation: All of these are common names of the Turtles found in India. Turtles are placed in reptiles. The five species are Green turtle (Chelonia mydas), Loggerhead (Caretta caretta), Olive Ridley (Lepidochelys olivacea), Hawksbill (Eretmochelys imbricata) and Leatherback (Dermochelys coriacea).
